thread.title: Ashley Madison clients' passwords REVEALED: What the login details tell us about sordid online cheaters
thread.title_full: Ashley Madison clients' passwords REVEALED: What the login details tell us about sordid online cheaters - Mirror Online

author: Jeff Parsons
title: Ashley Madison clients' passwords REVEALED: What the login details tell us about sordid online cheaters
text:
The Ashley Madison hack exposed the fact that thousands of Britons were looking to cheat on their partners .
Now, a comprehensive list of passwords used for the illicit affairs website has been posted online. And it reveals a lot about the people using the service.
Perhaps unsurprisingly, "12345" was the top choice - used for logging in to 120,511 accounts.
The term "password" itself came in at number three - unlocking 39,448 accounts.
Neither reveal much imagination - and would be easy to guess by a suspecting spouse.
But other passwords published on the list show the character of some of the users.
There were 7,893 accounts locked with the password "f***me" and 3,908 accounts that had been set with "cheater" as the password.
In a disturbing twist, 3,671 accounts used the password "iloveyou".
Ashley Madison is a dating website that encourages people to have affairs
The information was uncovered by a group called CynoSure Prime, which says it managed to crack 11.7 million passwords out of the 36 million signed up to the website.
“We crack passwords in gradual increasing complexity,” the group said, “so it is normal that we have recovered most of the simpler ones first.”
Security experts recommend people use a random mix of letters and numbers for their passwords - interspersed with symbols and different letter cases.
But research has consistently shown that people resort to staggeringly simple passwords so they are able to remember them.
The top 10 most-used Ashley Madison passwords 123456 - 120,511 accounts 12345 - 48,452 accounts password - 39,448 accounts DEFAULT - 34,275 accounts 123456789 - 26,620 accounts qwerty - 20,778 accounts 12345678 - 14,172 accounts abc123 - 10,869 accounts pussy - 10,683 accounts 1234567 - 9,468 accounts
Other passwords didn't make the top ten list, but should still be included for amusement include the following.
The passwords that think adding a few more words makes it harder to crack mypasswordispassword superhardpassword thebestpasswordever thisisagoodpassword Those that are having doubts about using the site ishouldnotbedoingthis ithinkilovemywife thisiswrong whatthehellamidoing whyareyoudoingthis cheatersneverprosper donteventhinkaboutit isthisreallyhappening Those that are in denial likeimreallygoingtocheat justcheckingitout justtryingthisout goodguydoingthewrongthing Those who think this is a dating site lookingfornewlife friendswithbenefits Those who trusted Ashley Madison youwillneverfindout youwillnevergetthis secretissafewithme Those that might have figured out what Ashley Madison is doing nothingfound theywererobots nobodyhere
